Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1980 FESTIVAL PLAZA DRIVE,SUITE 680, LAS VEGAS, Nevada, 89135, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Full House Resorts Inc, through its subsidiaries, owns, operates, develops, manages, and invests in casinos and related hospitality and entertainment facilities. It offers facility related to gaming, hotel, dining, entertainment, retail and other amenities. The group's operating segments include the Silver Slipper Casino and Hotel; the Bronco Billy's Casino and Hotel; Stockman's Casino; the Rising Star Casino Resort; and the Northern Nevada segment. There are some under construction projects too. Geographically, the casino operations of the company are managed in the United States. It derives revenues primarily from the gaming sources, which include revenues from slot machines, table games, keno, and sports betting.

value.name: John Ferrucci
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
